channel.title: [PI] PVP drops, makes login black PLEASE HELP
channel.description:
Hello Mopar,
On my Project insainity server, i have PVP drops activated. So when you kill a person u get a "Ruby chalice" "Armadyl totem" etc. So you can sell them in the shop.
- BUT! When people pick up the PvP drop, and tele the screen just goes black. And if they log out and try to log in again its also black.
The only thing to "unbug" an acount is to go to character folder and remove the item from inventory.
. Im basicly asking if any of you know how to fix this problem? Or why its happening? Or if you dont know that, how can i remove the PvP drop when u kill someone?
Thankyou ;D

item.title: [PI] PVP drops, makes login black PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Some int may be wrong in your ItemDef_2.java. Try to look it over and see if anything is in the wrong spot.

Read full topic

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

looks like the item was bugged while entering. What is happening is your users are getting nulled because they have the item in their inventory
